body:
WARNING: At least one of the links in the message below goes to an .exe file, 
which could be malicious. To learn how to protect yourself, please go here:
https://commons.lbl.gov/x/_591B




A fresh set of packages based on today's HEAD are on NREL's Github site,
Windows and Mac, Linux to follow. These include the fix for pcond on
Windows.


https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases




- Rob


On 10/20/14, 11:16 PM, "J. Alstan Jakubiec" <alstan at jakubiec.net> wrote:
